title: 关于1.14的村民
author: Dialog
txt_content: 请问1.14的版本，村民能否繁殖？？

replies.author: mine新时代xs
replies.txt_content:
是可以的，参考中文wiki：
https://minecraft-zh.gamepedia.c ... #.E7.B9.81.E6.AE.96
https://minecraft.gamepedia.com/ ... e_village_mechanics

replies.author: qsch
replies.txt_content: 可以只需要给他们丢面包就可以了
